medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior to admission with abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, and weakness. The patient also had a recent fall and hit his head shortly before the onset of symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Gastroesophageal reflux disease, Chronic kidney disease Stage I, Seizure disorder, Depression disorder, Venous insufficiency, Hypothyroidism, Osteoarthritis, Contact dermatitis, History of syncope and falls
